shared

Interface StatusBoardService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatusBoardServiceImpl

    public interface StatusBoardService
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Status Board Service. Service interface, should be implemented on respective server. Contains methods to add/remove observers to a RMI implementation. Created by Omnibox on 20/12/14.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(ServerStatusBoard observer)
      Adds given Remote as an observer.
      void removeObserver(ServerStatusBoard observer)
      Removes given Remote as an observer.
